organizations: New York City Parks and Recreation Department
lead_paragraph: An article in some editions on Thursday about efforts by Yankees fans to preserve Gate 2 of the old stadium and make it part of a new park with three ballfields misspelled the surname of the first deputy commissioner of the New York City Parks and Recreation Department. He is Liam Kavanagh, not Cavanaugh.
